dvd.title: Casablanca (Snap Case)
dvd.synopsis:
The story of a struggle among individuals who have sought refuge in Casablanca after fleeing Nazi occupied Europe.
Genre: Feature Film-Drama
Rating: PG
Release Date: 7-JUN-2005
Media Type: DVD
dvd.cast: Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, Paul Henreid, Claude Rains, Conrad Veidt
dvd.writer: Casey Robinson, Howard Koch, Joan Alison, Julius J. Epstein, Murray Burnett, Philip G. Epstein
